MESSAGE.value: added a Refresh item in optionsMenu for debugging.
use UriBuilder to avoid hard coding URL
display the real weather data by calling API from openweathermap
use location from sharedPreference file, and load real data when activity starts.
now app is able to use GPS feature to find geo location
